scripts.start: npm run docker && npm run compile && npm run migrate && npm run deploy-singular && npm run airdrop
scripts.start-test: npm run docker && npm run compile && npm run migrate && npm run deploy-singular && npm run airdrop && npm run test
scripts.restart: npm run docker-restart && npm run compile && npm run migrate && npm run deploy-singular && npm run airdrop
scripts.restart-test: npm run docker-restart && npm run compile && npm run migrate && npm run deploy-singular && npm run airdrop && npm run test
scripts.docker-restart: npm run docker-down && npm run docker
